component.description: Routines for Handling References to HDS Objects

abstract.p: It is sometimes useful to use the Hierarchical Data System HDS (SUN/92) to store references or pointers to other HDS objects. For instance, this allows the same data object to be used in several places without the need to have more than one copy. The REF library is provided to facilitate this data object referencing process and the subsequent accessing of objects which have been referenced in this way.
